reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Hawthorne's passion for physics is contagious! Her lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts with great clarity.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Chen is knowledgeable and approachable. His programming assignments are challenging but really help solidify the concepts.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her stuff, but her lectures can be a bit dry. More interactive elements would greatly improve the class.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Williams brings history to life! His storytelling approach makes even the most obscure historical events fascinating.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez creates a supportive learning environment. Her real-world examples make psychological theories more relatable.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee rushes through material too quickly. It's hard to keep up, and he doesn't seem open to questions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green's passion for the environment is inspiring. Her field trips and hands-on experiments make learning unforgettable.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's analysis of classic literature is insightful. He encourages critical thinking and lively class discussions.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Petrova is clearly brilliant, but sometimes struggles to explain concepts at an undergraduate level. Office hours are helpful though.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown makes economics relevant to everyday life. His classes are always full because of his engaging teaching style.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia challenges students to think critically about social issues. Her assignments are thought-provoking and well-designed.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Smith seems more interested in pushing his own political views than teaching objective political theory.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are like guided tours through art museums. Her enthusiasm for art is infectious.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Kim sets high standards but provides excellent support. His industry experience adds valuable context to the coursework.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. White is knowledgeable, but her assignments can be unclear. More structured guidelines would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Hassan's socratic method of teaching really gets students thinking. Every class is an intellectual adventure.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Lee breaks down complex neurological concepts well. Her use of case studies helps connect theory to practice.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Prof. Davis often cancels classes last minute and seems disorganized. The course content is good when he does teach.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez brings anthropology to life with her fieldwork stories. Her classes are always the highlight of my day.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Wright has a gift for explaining complex musical concepts. His ear training exercises have greatly improved my skills.
